Senior Software Engineer

Passionate and dedicated software engineer with strong problem-solving skills, an agile mindset, and a background in technology. Proven ability to navigate challenges and achieve optimal outcomes. Beyond technical expertise, I analyze data during my free time and indulge my creative side by designing software, websites, and apps, reflecting both technical prowess and enthusiasm for exploring new possibilities in technology.
